values:
Every single time I see you I start to feel this way
It makes me wonder if I'm ever gonna feel this way again....

I want to hold you and love you in my arms and then
I want to lead you 'cause I need to be with you 'til the end
Then I hear myself reply you've got to hold it in.....

If only I had the guts to feel this way
if only you'd look at me and want to stay.....

I sit here waiting wondering hoping that I'll make this right
'Cause all I think about is your hands
Your face and all these lonely nights
There's a feeling screaming in the back of my head
Saying over and over....

I want to hold you love you in my arms and then
I want to need you 'cause I need to be with you 'til the end
Then I hear myself reply she'll never let you in.....

I want to hear you say
It'll always be this way
We'll be hand in hand for every night and every day....

Bits and pieces of a song, by this band I just found out about...they call themselves Hanson...and I really like their songs, especially this one, cuz it's....<s>kinda how I feel about Triana</s> a nice song. They're kinda cute, and it's not every day you see a girl rock band. Nice. <s>Totally can't let Hank find out I like a girl rock band though, I'd never hear the end of it.</s>

~Dean~
http://dean-venture.livejournal.com/38406.html

So0o0o...I hear there's a hurricane out there....with MY name on it! Named after ME! Beware the wrath of DEAN!!! Mwahahaha!! Shake with fear at HURRICANE DEAN, YOU FOOLS!!

How awesome is that?! I bet Hank is so jealous, he wishes he had a hurricane named after HIM!

Sorry, I couldn't contain myself....it's just so freakin' awesome!

More later!

~Dean the Hurricane!~
http://dean-venture.livejournal.com/38384.html

Wow...it's been...awhile. I almost forgot about this thing! We've been so very busy with adventure and...other things...some I can't even describe....some I don't WANT to think about anymore...

*sigh*

In other news...I...Triana....I tried to...but...it meant so much to me... and so little to her 

Golly...I'm sinking into a mountain of self pity...
 
Why can't I simply disregard all the things I feel?

Love is...so confusing...

Anyway, sorry for the long lack of posting...I'll try to uh...keep up with this thing better.

Later.

~Dean~
http://dean-venture.livejournal.com/38062.html

Ya know what's a really really good movie? Like, really super good? Jungle Emperor Leo. Seriously, it's super good. About how humans can have horrible effects on the enviroment all because of their greedy selfish ways....but then again, not all humans are bad, some actually HELP animals....and Leo the white lion, the king of the jungle, is a very wise king and makes the right decisions....very good, super good movie.....

~Dean~
http://dean-venture.livejournal.com/37731.html

My Donny TMNT action figure is broken, I need to take it back....his left arm won't bend down :c Oh well, maybe I can trade him in for the Leonardo one! Triana seems to like Leo a lil more anyway...she like, can't get over the fact that I can sound just like him if I clear my throat and concentrate...she gets all giddy on me when I do it.

Awesome, huh? Awesome for me anyway *snerk*

In other news, Pop's back. See? I knew it would be fine...I mean, Brock wasn't worried over it, so....anyway he's back and ok and that's all that matters. That's all for now! Laters!

~Dean~
http://dean-venture.livejournal.com/37171.html

OH MY GOLLY!! There's a new Ninja Turtle movie coming out sooooooon!!!!! In officially 17 days!!!

I'm SO ALL OVER THAT!!!

WHO'S WITH ME?!?!?!

I can't wait to see Leonardo and Donatello in action!!! YESSSSS!!!!!

~Dean~
http://dean-venture.livejournal.com/37016.html

Hiyas everyone! Guess what?! I'm all better now! 

Golly, that ws some nasty stomache bug, I thought it would never go away...but it's finally all gone and I feel like my old self again!

Thank you so much for coming to visit me and take care of me, Triana dearest. I love you.

Ok so...I'm back in action! And....bored....uh...who's up for an adventure?! 

....anyone?

....anyone at all?

......what's everyone been doing anyway? I feel like I've missed alot......

~Dean~
http://dean-venture.livejournal.com/36266.html

Sorry for...not being around lately. I got kinda wrapped up in a Giant Boy Detective book...and then...I think I caught some kinda bug. My stomache has been feeling horrible, I keep feeling like I'm gonna puke er something. Plus my throat hurts alot and I just feel....like blah in general.

So...sorry I missed out on Brisbyland, I woulda loved to have gone but....I felt really crappy. <s>Apparently it was pretty horrible anyway so..I guess I didn't miss much</s>

I'll be uh, prolly moving from the tv in the living room to my books in my room, back and forth randomly as I get bored of one and the other.....until I get better. Come visit me if you're bored! ....if.....you don't think you'll catch this from me that is. 

I miss you, Tri. Sorry I haven't been keeping in touch.

((mun's way of making an excuse of why her character's arent posting during this whole time shes gone...back from katsucon btw, which was freakin awesome, stories coming soon XD))

~Dean~
http://dean-venture.livejournal.com/35968.html

Happy Valentine's day one and all!


(art copyright Vee aka our Billy whose name I cant remember or have time to look up, will fix later XD) I LOVE YOU TRIANA! ~Dean~
http://dean-venture.livejournal.com/35613.html

Last night's party was kinda cool! Ed made REALLY YUMMY cookies! Thanks again Ed! And -I- made a NEW best friend, who is NOT Hank!

Pickles the drummer of Dethklok said I was his new best friend! Cuz...cuz I kept telling Hank and Simon that he's NOOOOOOOT BALD -OR- BALDING! It's his HAIR SYLE, that's just how it looks! ....right Mister Pickles? Right! It's super cool to have a famous band member as a BEST FRIEND! Upon further research of my new best friend, I discovered he used to have his very OWN band too! Snakes 'n Barrels? Sounds neat! ....wonder why he switched over to Dethklok? I mean, being a drummer for an awesome band like Dethklok is really cool but...wouldn't it be better to have your OWN band? *shrugs* Anyway...he said I could come visit whenever I want and...test out that constantly being drunk is awesome but you have to make sure you don't become undrunk or it sucks thing....

Maybe I'll come test it out sometime soon.

Also, another thing for me to try to figure out....I asked him why he and Skwisgaar fight so hard core all the time, I thought they were friends....something was brought up about....they had a....GOOD kind of hate? Their hate was good but...other hate isn't? Hmm...I'm still confused by this....it requires further research!

If anyone needs me, I'll be in my room! Thinking...and thinking....and thinking....

~Dean~
http://dean-venture.livejournal.com/35502.html

Back from Japan! And from...being kidnapped by evil master...er...ninjas with evil master plans and stuff...it was that Otaku guy that wanted Pop's ooray from before! He was trying to get revenge! But it's ok, Brock kicked his butt good!

<s>Though he seemed REALLY annoyed he had to come all the way out to Japan to get me...and I don't think I'll be going on any trips again for a long long time....yeah...</s>

Well I'm home again and....already bored. What's everyone been up to while I was away? I heard that Fuu got some magic potion so she could get a job or something and now she's almost the same age as Hank and me? Weird...and that Mister Toki got kidnapped by Moanrch? But...he's ok now and back, yeah? Wonder what that was all about...

Well, since that SIMON kid seems to be Hank's NEW best friend who's better then his OWN BROTHER....I'm just gonna go....read a book or something for now....I don't know....

~Dean~
http://dean-venture.livejournal.com/35118.html

Well, all packed up to finally come home! Japan was GREAT, but I sure do miss home and will be glad to be back. I'm getting a little tired of asian food anyway, as yummy as it is. Triana and I will be getting on our plane soon!

....there's this creepy...ninja looking guy that's been following us around the past day or so. Like....everytime I look up, he's there...and if he sees that I see him he freaks out and hides really fast. He started out at just a distance at first so I really didn't think much of it....but I've noticed lately everytime I see him he's closer and closer....it's getting really creepy. Weird...

Anyway, be home soon! 

~Dean~
http://dean-venture.livejournal.com/35052.html

I bet you can't guess!! I bet you can't!!


Him!! I MET MIKEY SIMON!! Kappa Mikey of LilyMu!!! And he was amazing and fantastic and everything I thought he would be and it was GREAT! He even showed me the set of LilyMu and I got to sit on his awesome bike and everything!! But...then his boss kicked us out...Ozu? Yeah...he likes to yell alot apparently...but then he took us on a mini tour of Tokyo to point out where all the billboards with his face on them were...and to the toy store where he bought me a Kappa Mikey action figure and signed it for me!! Oh man, it was SO GREAT! But then...he started hitting on Triana....he kissed her hand and started saying how cute she was and everything and offered to take her out for sushi...uh...the guy's awesome but...that wasn't so great. More to come on Adventures of Dean in Japan! Man I'm having a BLAST! :D
http://dean-venture.livejournal.com/34446.html

Well here I am in Japan! It's a blast! Though I AM already pretty sick of white rice...but I'm getting the hang of eating with chopsticks pretty good! And maaaaaan is sushi GREAT! Never thought I'd like it, but I gave it a chance and it's delicious!

It's rather unfortunate that I never did get that money from Mister Toki...I coulda really used it on this trip. He was sleeping on the beach with Fuu holding her hand and looked rather...a cross between completely drained and rather content...so I didn't bother him. Um, not that I really deserved it anyway...I mean, I TRIED to do what he asked the night before, but I got to the party late so I didn't get to do it then. Though I don't understand why he wanted me to do that...when he looked pretty happy lying there with Fuu....oh well, whatever.

Triana and I have just been wandering around the shops and everything the past few days...tomorrow we get to actually MEET MIKEY SIMON OF LILYMU! And the next day...love hotel I think. Uh...I heard that's supposed to be...a blast. *blush* Yeah.

Well I'm still alive and having fun and haven't ran into anyone asking if I wanted to...pay them to do...things to me yet. And I also haven't bought any panties! Learn from other people's mistakes...

More later! :D

~Dean~
http://dean-venture.livejournal.com/34257.html

We're on the plane we're on the plane! We're almost in Japan, we're almost in Japan! Yay yay yaaaaaaaay! Oh GOLLY I can't wait!

Oh yeah, about the party...it was uh....well, I was kinda late and hear I missed some good stuff. That stinks. <s>I also kinda failed my mission Mister Toki gave me....soooooorry. But from the looks of it when I got there, it musta not turned out so bad after all, right? I dunno, no one explained anything to me. He looked kinda happy sleeping there on the beach holding Fuu's hand though, with her kimono covering him up...and she looked rather happy too! And...kinda cute in her bikini....DON'T HURT ME TRI, I DIDN'T MEAN IT LIKE THAT!!Guh...</s> I'm sorry, I couldn't find my trunks! That's why I was so late! Err......

ANYWAY, hey I TRIED the night before to get something outta Triana about it but...she was either reeeeeeally good at not giving in to telling me or had no clue what I was trying to ask her. I...really didn't understand what I was trying to find out either. Oh well. Sorry Mister Toki.

Limb was there to kill the mood of course...I kept Triana tight in my arms and awaaaaay from him! He kept reminding her of all the.....fun.....they used to have together....it was rather GROSS and CREEPY! I think he was trying to make up some kinda evil plan that if he kept doing that she'd remember and come back? NO, not gonna happen! She told me she's happy with me now!

Also some little kid with a...killer bunny....named Simon kept trying to hit on Triana and make her take him out on a date! WHAT WAS THIS, HIT ON DEAN'S GIRLFRIEND NIGHT?! I SURE DIDN'T GET THE MEMO!! Geeeeez....

It doesn't matter, me and my girl are about to spend a good week or so ALONE together in Japan! Oooooh yeah! We'll be there in another half hour or so! Later! :D

~Dean~
http://dean-venture.livejournal.com/33921.html

Another party on Orpheus Island tomorrow, I'm excited! It's always a fun place to be...and always a fun time to see Tri in a bikini of course...er...

She's out taking Fuu to get her a bathing suit right now...they're having a uh..."girls day out" kinda thing...girly stuff...they keep whispering to each other and giggling and stuff...eh, whatever. Girl stuff. As long as they don't keep whispering and glancing MY way, I know I'm in the clear and not to worry about it. <s>Though Triana DID help Fuu hang a Dethlok poster above her bed earlier...and a fold out of Toki...and a fold out of Pickles too, to which I heard her say "just to be safe", whatever that means...</s> Girls...whatever.

After the party, Triana and I will be leaving for Japan! I'm so excited! <s>And now I can finally get my head outta these books! Though I guess I really didn't have to get THIS into them anyway, its not like we're going to LIVE there or anything. Mmm, I get weird like that...obsessed over this kinda stuff.</s> I feel bad about ditching Tri the past week or so for my books...I'll have to find a way to...pay her back for it...while we're in Japan. Hmm...what do to....

Well, next time I write in this thing, I'll be in Japan! Can't wait! Later!

~Dean~
http://dean-venture.livejournal.com/33666.html

Seems like I missed a good adventure of a party, eh? Sorry....history is so much fun, I get wrapped up in it when I start reading about it...and by the time I had started to lose interest and realized I had to go to the bathroom and looked up....it was EXTREMELY LATE!

I missed the treasure hunt...sorry....but golly reading is fun!

Triana told me it was ok though, the Monarch found what they were hunting for and all he won was a grill...that's kinda dumb. *shrugs* Oh well....

We went off exploring in the mansion and found a HUGE LIBRARY! I was in HEAVEN! Hank tried to make fun of me saying librarys and books and learning were lame and for nerds but....Triana said nerds were sexy. Oooooh yeeeeeah!

I fell asleep with my nose in a book...I think I overloaded my brain with knowlege cuz I woke up with a headache...it was just...soooo many books, soooooo much to learn and I didn't even know where to begin! Wow, it was amazing...and I bet Mr. Lupin hasn't even touched 90% of those books ever in his lifetime...what a waste.

But yeah, woke up and...my brain hurts so much right now...we're in some hotel and Fuu's in a bed next to mine with that chocolate drool bubble still going, she's starting to stir though...and Toki's on the sofa nearby...ugh, I'll have to find Triana and ask where I can get some asprin.

~Dean~
http://dean-venture.livejournal.com/33086.html

I woke up this morning with a book on my chest....and I thought that I had just fallen asleep reading again. But when I picked up the book...there was like...it was a book I'd never seen before. It had a hologram in it when I picked it up, of Mr. Lupin...and he was inviting me to some party he was having...and something to do with treasure...it sounds like fun!

I'll be there Mr. Lupin! You betcha! ....though I might be late...I've been really hardcore with my studying up on the Japanese language.

I came over to visit Triana earlier today to see if she was invited to the party as well and....Mr. Toki was sleeping on her couch....? Uh...I dunno why....I didn't really...ask. Though after seeing the way Tri's new friend Fuu looked at him...over and over...I felt more relaxed...assuming it was more of a thing invloving her, not Tri.

Triana's right, we should never assume things. Silly little Fuu...ah, to be young and in love....<s>wait...er...</s>. Maybe Fuu will test me on my Japanese knowlege later...after she gets herself out of daydream land...I'm trying really hard not to tease her, since she's a friend of Triana's....plus I know it's not always fun to be teased.

Well, that's all that's going on in my life at the moment.

~Dean~
http://dean-venture.livejournal.com/32672.html

Sunday's party prooved to be...pretty much insane just like every other party. I apparently missed an egg snowball fight...I was a little late because I got wrapped up in my book.

Later Phantom jerk-head showed up...and started to pick a fight with Pop....and mister manager stuck up for Pop but got beat up pretty bad by Limb's death hands...I was pretty scared, I thought he was gonna die! 

But he's okay though, so that makes me really happy!

And then me and Triana had a little fight...about me wanting to protect her and her worrying about me...but I think we came to terms in the end. Which is always good.

And then I got really bored and fell into that state I often find myself in...where I start daydreaming and rambling off random useless facts I've learned. And then Triana decided we should proove a certian fact wrong...that the average human spends two weeks on average kissing....she said we can totally beat that....and then we left on our adventure to beat said fact. And...we're alot closer then you think, being it's only been a day! Eh heh....

Triana apparently met a new friend last night, a girl named Fuu. I think I get to meet her tomorrow sometime, which is good...I like making new friends, and I've heard she's a very nice talkative friendly girl. Neat!

Nothing much else to say, just basically spent the day with my nose in some books, reading up on Japanese culture...the language and traditions and so on, for our trip to Japan! Thanks again for the books Jin....

~Dean~
http://dean-venture.livejournal.com/32268.html

We have SO MUCH SNOW at the compound right now, it's crazy!! But, I love it! I love snow, it's so much fun! Execpt when Brock notices me getting dressed to go out and play in it and says for me to bring a shovel along and dig his car out while I'm at it....oh well. January has been a crazy month so far!! I mean...first Hank's....theft thing. Sorry Hank, I know you don't wanna talk about it but....it was insane!! And...and then this...Dethwater thing. Wow, that was....mad crazy!! I'm just glad everyone made it outta that alive!! Especially my Tri.... All crazy aside though...I have a feeling....a good feeling. Like...that everything will be okay, even though it seems insane right now. Triana came out with me and helped me dig out Brock's car....and started a snowball fight. The little lady didn't know what she was getting herself into though!! Eh...ok so she won....I let her win though, because I'm a gentlemen.


((pic copyright Vee, a present for me for Christmas)) Well, that was my general day...having fun with Tri out in the snow...I invited Hank to come out with us too but....he said no thanks. I'm starting to get worried about him...he hasn't really seemed...himself since this whole...thing he went through. I hope he's okay... ~Dean~
http://dean-venture.livejournal.com/32027.html

My poor Triana!! She got hurt so badly, her poor arm!! Oh but I'm just so super glad she made it outta there alive, the poor thing! I was so worried about her! I'm so happy to have my girl back here in my arms safe and sound....

Triana you are never going to another Dethklok concert again!! I mean....unless I'm sure it's safe...I....

please don't do anything like that again.....

I don't wanna think of life without you......

Well, Triana won't leave my sight for the next few days, til her arm heals anyway...you shall not lift a finger, love! 

~Dean~
http://dean-venture.livejournal.com/31745.html

Hank, I don't know where you are or what you're doing but....what the heck is wrong with you?! WHY haven't you at least contacted ME to let me know you're ok?! Or had Haru do it or something?! I mean, I'm your BROTHER! We're TEAM Venture, remember? <s>You know that I cried all night last night wondering where the heck you were and if you were ok and why you hadn't told me yet? Triana had to come over and comfort me, thank you very much.</s>

Ya know what? This whole thing was totally RETARDED on your part. I mean, I knew you weren't say, the brightest one but....jesus, Hank. And you know what, you'd better be ok and come home soon, and be prepared cuz I'm SO gonna <s>try to</s> kick your butt for all this you crazy jerkhead!

....brothers......can't live with them.....<s>can't live without them</s>
http://dean-venture.livejournal.com/31283.html

OH MY GOD HANK!! WHAT WERE YOU THINKING?! WHAT IS WRONG WITH YOU?! YOU ARE INSANE!! YOU'RE SUPPOSED TO START SMALL FIRST AND WORK YOUR WAY UP STUPID!! YOU ARE SO DEAD, YOU ARE SO GONNA BE KILLED!!! ARGH WHAT THE HECK AM I SUPPOSED TO DO NOW WITHOUT YOU?! HAAAAAANK!!!
WHO HAS MY BROTHER?! WHERE IS HE?! I WANT HIM BACK NOWWWWWWWW!! :c
http://dean-venture.livejournal.com/31180.html

I, Dean Michael Venture, have entered the 2007 year determined to proove to my father that I am not a wimpy spazzy boy, but A MAN!

~Dean~
http://dean-venture.livejournal.com/30842.html

....Ok so.....CHRISTMAS! Ok for Christmas I got SWEATER VESTS!! I got a red one and a blue one with white diamond shapes in it and a green one with frosty the snowman on it for Christmas time! Awesome? YEAH! And an iEYE...which is...cool I guess. That was stuff from Pop.

Brock got me 5 outta the 10 books in the new Giant Boy Detective series!! Wheee!!! And also...some money. Cuz he was gonna get me some throwing knives but...decided that was a bad idea. Since I'm....accident prone...so he says. I coulda handled them! ....oh well. It's always good to have a little cash in the pocket! ^-^

Hank and I got hover snow mobiles from Uncle JJ!! How cool is that?! They're awesome!! And dude!! ....Unlce JJ secretly gave me another present....he said Santa left it at his house by mistake but it was for me. ....Santa? Er...it DID say from Santa on it. I thought that....nevermind. Anyway, it was a cute little robot dog! It was like, like an iDog, but only it can walk and follows you around and plays whatever song you tell it to....as long as you've programed it into it. Like, it follows voice commands. And it lights up and everything! It's so cute!! I named it Scamp...after our dearly departed doggy....I miss Scamp.

I still have to give Hank his Christmas present....we share a room so it's hard to keep presents a secret from each other....I had to hide it really well. And....I kinda forgot where I hid it. I'll find it eventually though! And...boy will he be suprised. I'm glad Triana liked her present, she seemd pretty happy with it. I'm happy she liked it. Brock got uh....I found one of those Christmas videos Hank and I snagged...last year. For...viewing purposes...and just wrapped it up and gave it back to him. Hoping he wouldn't notice it was once his...and that we had snagged it. And Pop got....Hank and I made him some cookies and...I bought him a bath robe...and gave him a little coupon I made....for one free lab assistant! I'll help him out with whatever he needs in the lab one day! ....he didn't seem as excited about it as I had hoped but...he said thank you though.

And...that was my Christmas pretty much! Hope everyone enjoyed theirs!

~Dean~
http://dean-venture.livejournal.com/30554.html

Christmas! Christmas was WONDERFUL! I LOOOOVED MY CHRISTMAS!!! I got a--oh crap, I gotta go. Pop's like SCREAMING at me to take all the bags of used wrapping paper and the egg nog people left sitting out all night out to the trash....but rest assured I'll be back to make my beloved CHRISTMAS POST!! Sorry it's taken to long, Hank and I have been busy playing with our new things! Be back soon!

((Sorry I've been busy with Christmas stuff and when I was about to make this post I realized HEY I have to go to work now! lol SO.....tonight.))

~Dean~
http://dean-venture.livejournal.com/30223.html

Well...Hank and I...our visit to Triana's place last night was interesting. Actually it was.....pretty great. Awesome, even. I was kinda unsure about it at first, with Hank there and all <s>cuz I get kinda jealous sometimes</s> but...it turned out fine after all.

I....I hope....Hank and Triana enjoyed our little visit as much as I did. I...had alot of fun. I'm glad we got to spend that time together. Yeah. We should...do it again sometime?

Happy Birthday, Triana....I hope you liked Hank and I...er, us visiting you last night. We had a blast...right Hank?

~Dean~
http://dean-venture.livejournal.com/29961.html

Happy Birthday Triana!! I've got you some great gifts, I hope you like them! I'll be over later today to give them to you! And as far as....Hank and I will....later tonight. Waaaay later tonight. Like...laaaaaaaaaate. I think. We'll see.

Hope your day goes great my love! :D

~Dean~
http://dean-venture.livejournal.com/29672.html

Every time I think of you
I feel shot right through with a bolt of blue
It's no problem of mine but it's a problem I find
Living a life that I can't leave behind
There's no sense in telling me
The wisdom of a fool won't set you free
But that's the way that it goes
And it's what nobody knows
While every day my confusion grows

...some songs are just...so pretty.

Triana, I can't wait for your birthday! I've got your presents already....I wish I could just give them to you now! I really really hope you like them!

I feel fine and I feel good
I'm feeling like I never should
Whenever I get this way, I just don't know what to say

...music is awesome, isn't it?

~Dean~
http://dean-venture.livejournal.com/29269.html

Christmas party at Monarch's was....I'm trying not to think about it. Um...

Hank kissed me. I just....he said....golly, I don't wanna think about it anymore.

Triana gave me something to drink that I drank in one huge gulp, not knowing what it was and wished I hadn't right afterwards. It made my nose and throat burn and eyes water. Then I started feeling all hot....and taking my clothes off. What the heck was wrong with me?!

Turns out I ended up showing off those Santa boxers Tri got me with the hat after all, after being determined NO ONE would see me in them! Geez...

Aaaaand....I don't remember what happened after that...but I woke up in Triana's bed at her apartment....still wearing just those boxers and that hat that keeps falling into my eyes....WITH Triana in bed with me....wearing just HER Christmas undies she got at Victoria's Secret...oh...man....<s>talk about EMBARASSING. I hope we didn't do it or something!</s> My reaction was embarssing enough, nevermind the situation in general! I jumped up and screamed and ran for the door in my undies! Tri calmed me down though and explained the situation...still....I'm feeling reeeeeally weirded out by that....

Well....laters....

~Dean~
http://dean-venture.livejournal.com/29091.html

Christmas shopping with Triana today! Was...interesting. Kinda embarassing actually....

The very FIRST store she made me go in with her? Victoria Secret! Geez, I always promised myself I'd NEVER go in that store and....look what happened. I could just feel how red my face was...and she kept holding up frilly things saying "Do you think this would look good on me?" I was glad to get outta there.....

Then we went to TJ Maxx for the rest of our shopping. I wandered over to the men's section to pick up a pack of underwear for Hank cuz he asked me to...and Triana....she spotted these boxers. These red velvet-ish boxers, with white trim....and they came with a Santa hat. And...she told me I'd look so cute in them and she was buying them and I HAD to wear them....at the Christmas party. And she did buy them. And....I'm afraid I'm gonna have to wear them.

Then we went to a cozy little cafe nearby and split a BLT sandwich and had some hot cocoa...and chatted some. It felt...nice. Afterwards we just wandered around the mall some, observing the decorations and the people and the sales different stores were advertising and so on...and humming the Christmas music that was playing as we walked along.

That was fun Triana, thanks for coming shopping with me. I picked up something for Brock and something for Pop....now I just need....Hank, Dr. Orpheus, Kim, and...Triana. Hmm...

Well, I'm home and I'm trying to work on this project Hank wants me to do...but I think I'll hit the sack for now and work on it more tomorrow. Later!

~Dean~
http://dean-venture.livejournal.com/28885.html

Well, apparently last night Kim broke in and pulled some pranks off on Hank. But...Brock heard her and saved him from most of the pranks. The spiders got him, but I let Nibbles out and he ate them all up. And...I think he wants me to go out and buy him some new underwear while I'm out finishing up my Christmas shopping with Triana tomorrow.

I went over to Triana's house to make some Christmas cookies.We had alot of fun, making snowman shapped cookies that looked like her and me and I made one of Hank and she made one of Pop...and we made a Santa one that looks like Brock! And we made some of her grandma's famous chocolate chip cookies too! And while they were baking...we....hung out and...talked. I tried to show her how I played Jingle Bells on my bass but I got too nervous and couldn't do it heh.

Triana really is...an awesome person. I hope she knows that. We started talking about...things and....I feel...alot better then I have the past few....days...weeks even. I...don't really feel....like, empty anymore. 

I've....found my cable.

I went to tuck her in before I left, but she wanted me to stay with her just a little longer....and we fell asleep cuddling on her bed. I woke up just now...and I couldn't have been happier about where I was. And now I'm going back to bed! I'll stop by the compound before we go shopping to feed Nibbles and drop the cookies off....good night!

~Dean~
http://dean-venture.livejournal.com/28631.html

Well....Kim seems to not be upset with me...which is good. Defiantely relieved about that. Though...things might be kinda awkward between us next time we meet....

But....

she seems to be furious with Hank for some reason. I mean...I don't know why...don't know what he did...but, I think it best to stay outta that one. I'm sure he deserves it...he usually does. I...really don't remember him ever doing anything to her though...oh well.

....Triana? W...would it be ok...if I took you up on that baking cookies offer tomorrow? I...I'll bring my own cookie cutters. I've got snowmen and Christmas trees. I...I'm just kinda...I feel lonley...and guilty about what I did to Kim. W...would you keep me company? I think making cookies would be fun....

Let me know if that's ok and when I should come over. Er...you might have to come get me actually, if thats ok. But yeah...let me know.

<s>I am kinda lonely, but still...it's good to be home. I...kinda missed Pop and Brock.....and Hank.</s>

~Dean~
http://dean-venture.livejournal.com/28267.html

Dearest Kim,

I'm sorry, but...I can't do this anymore. I've been thinking and thinking the past few days, and...this super villian thing was a cool idea and it was fun setting things up for you and everything...really, it was great, especially since I actually felt useful for once. But...I'm just not the villian type. I can't do it...can't be mean and evil. It's...just not in my heart.

Also....

I...I think we need to call it quits on our...relationship. I'm really sorry. I just...don't really think I love you. I mean, I like you a WHOLE lot, you're a great, awesome person! But...I don't...feel like I can be anything more then a friend to you. I mean, the kissing and so on...I just don't feel right. That's why I hardly ever say "I love you" back. 

...I'm really really sorry, Kim. I hope you understand. And I hope you forgive me. And I hope we can...still be friends. And I can still be Dr. Arachnid and help you out when you need me....but I'd prefer it to be for technical things only. Or...anything that doesn't require me being cruel.

I'm taking my things and going home now, back to the compound. Er...I'll come back for my golden statue later, if that's ok.

I'm really sorry, Kim. Please don't hate me.

~Your friend, Dean Venture~

I have something to say, that needs to be said...but I don't know if I can do it or not. I'll....I'll do it. Later. After some careful consideration that...that this is the right decision. Wish me luck ~Dean~

http://dean-venture.livejournal.com/27858.html

This...this thing....I...I just don't know anymore....

I've been shut in my room the past 2 days, letting Kim take care of the henchmen and other needs around the lair. Er...after all...I made the costumes and the plans for the lair and the weaponry and collected the henchmen...I kinda need a break. I hope she understands...

...and knows I'm not like, mad at her or anything...and I hope she's not upset with me for avoiding her....I just...

need some time to myself right now. Things are just too crazy...and I don't understand what's going on anymore.

Hank's right. Nothing makes sense anymore. Nothing's the way it should be...the way it used to be anyway.

I supposed I'll come to that party tomorrow...if I remember to pull myself outta my daydream. I forget about real life sometimes when I'm deep in thought, and I defiantely need to do some deep thinking right about now.

Um, I'm hungry. Gonna go see if Kim picked up anything good at the store....

~Dean~
http://dean-venture.livejournal.com/27457.html

Today...oh who cares.

I'm...so confused on things.

Kim's really into this whole training the henchmen thing. She's really got things running pretty good, and the henchmen listen to her and respect her. Whenever I try to get them to do things though, they just kinda look at me as if to say "you're kidding me, right?" or they laugh at me. I even tried being mean a little, and it STILL didn't work...until Kim saw me trying and that they weren't listening and screamed at them to respect me just as well as her.

I mean...I'll give it a little more time I guess but...I just don't know if things are going to work out.

To add the the confusion...Triana. Triana wrote a poem. To me. TO ME. About...loving me. And...I almost starting crying. I mean, doesn't she know...that I love Kim now? What does she expect me to do? Just...just drop Kim and come running to her, even after all the times I tried with HER and she just ignored me rather cold-heartedly? Really, that's just cruel to Kim, and...just, not right. <s>But my heart is hurting and my brain is just going to explode!</s> I have no idea what I should do. I know she's in pain and I hate to reject her...

Man, life..just sucks right now for me. I guess I...just need to take things as they come. Tomorrow's another day, and maybe things will be better. Maybe if I focus my confusion into anger and focus the anger toward the henchmen...I can finally get them to take me seriously.

In other news, Nibbles is growing SO fast! He's like, the size of my head now! Wow! Cute little zombie spider...maybe if I set him on the henchmen, they'll listen to me THEN! HA!

Heard Hank totally blew it with that comic book. Bummer, I bet it was worth SO much too. None of my Spiderman ones are special ones, though I assume they're all worth at least a little. Oh well, they're still slightly amusing to read, though I prefer mysteries.

Well...back to my room I go...to feed Nibbles...maybe read a little...<s>but mostly wonder what the heck I'm doing with my life right now and if it's what I WANT to be doing with my life...</s>

<s>I wonder if anyone at home misses me...or even notices that I'm gone.</s>

~Dean~
http://dean-venture.livejournal.com/27303.html

Well the training the henchmen thing...was pretty...I dunno, I didn't like it very much. I know we need to get them in shape and show them we're the bosses and all but...shooting at them? Constantly screaming at them and calling them horrible names and such? It just seems...so cruel to me. I don't know, I tried to be a little mean but, I just felt so bad doing it.

Maybe I'll be better at it tomorrow.

Right now we're at a bar...Kim took the henchmen out for drinks and fun, as a reward to those who survived I guess heh. They're all drunk off their butts...and so is Kim...and they're all having fun with their joking around and singing and such. It's...pretty amusing I guess. 

Kim keeps asking me to drink and have fun with her too but...I dunno, I just don't feel up for it. I drank a little bit in hopes I'd...start feeling the fun too. But it just made me feel...kinda depressed really. I just keep thinking about Triana and how sick she is and wondering if she's okay. <s>And the things she said to me...was it just the cough syrup, or did she really mean it? Some of it? ALL of it?</s>

Well, lets forget about that and focus on the fun...bottoms up, huh? Good thing Brock's not here. Hope I don't totally embarass myself...

~Dean~
http://dean-venture.livejournal.com/26934.html

Ya know, I didn't even know that Kim had left a big mark on my neck from kissin' me at my birthday party...she calls it...a hickey? I was wondering what it was, though when I pointed out to her it was almost cleared up...but she went ahead and made it worse, cuz...I think she likes embarassing me for some reason. It makes her smile...

I...I told Kim I had some things to do at the mall before we left for our training in Mexico. I told her it was Christmas shopping and she couldn't come. I...I DID go to the mall...and I DID try and find a Christmas present for her but...couldn't find anything I thought she'd like. So...I'll have to ask her what she wants and go back and try again. I picked up some more mice for Nibbles though...and then...I went and visited Triana. By myself. She got on last night and talked to me a little and asked me to come over. Just me. I don't know why she didn't want Kim to come...but she said...just me...and not to tell Kim. So...I did. I felt kinda...guilty but...I did it. She...was just so sick...she seemed...in so much pain. Physically and mentally, really. I went with the intentions of...being friendly and taking care of her some, keeping her company and all...FRIENDLY. Not..what you might be thinking, I swear. 

She...threw up some...and though it grossed me out (usually seeing other people throw up makes me wanna too) I...I got her the bucket, and held her hair back for her, and cleaned whatever mess was made up for her. She kept smiling at me for doing this, though everytime her eyes would fill with tears almost instantly. I...I don't know what's going on. She...wanted me there, so badly it seemed...but yet she kept breaking down in tears everytime I'd help her. Maybe the cough meds she's taking make her a little loopy. When she wasn't throwing up, she was either sleeping or rambling on to me about how her life sucks so much, and she's made so many wrong choices she wishes she could take back, and how she thought coming back from the dead would be like a fresh start on life for her but she totally blew it (...WHAT?!) and she was sorry she dragged me into it and screwed my life up too...and she was sorry she kept hurting me and she loved me so much but it was too late now, she snoozed she lost....I have no idea what any of it meant. I think that cough syrup had a horrible effect on her, she was...speaking crazy 99% of the time. I just started nodding and saying "uh huh" to her...cuz...none of it really made any sense. <s>Deep down though...really deep down in my heart...I silently hoped that maybe...just maybe...her finally admitting that she loves me...wasn't crazy talk. I...I have Kim now though, and I...love her. But something in me ached when she said that...</s>

When she finally stopped babbling on and...I don't know if she passed out or just fell asleep...but when she was quiet, I got up and cleaned things up and made her my mad awesome chicken soup. When she woke back up, she seemed so drained...I put on the live action TMNT movie and we watched it together while I fed her my soup...and when it was over I left. She just...the way she kept looking at me everytime I'd give her some soup...and the way she looked at me when I finally said goodbye...she's hurting. Not just physically because of her cold either. I feel so bad but...with Kim...I can't help it. I...love Kim now. I'm sorry...her eyes were filled with tears as I reached for the door, and her pitiful attempt to look happy as she said goodbye and thanks for coming over....<s>and I don't think she knows, but I heard her start sobbing as I closed the door behind me. It just makes me feel 10 times worse...</s> 

*gulps*

I...I had a nice time, Tri...I hope you feel better soon. I...I'll come over sometime soon again if you need some company. But, I'll be in Mexico training the henchmen with Kim until Sunday so...I'll see you sometime after then.

~Dean~
http://dean-venture.livejournal.com/26776.html

Happy Birthday Hank. Sorry it's a little late. Enjoy your bag'o'money ($250 cash, my share of a job Kim did) and...the mask. Yeah, I went in Pop's room and got it back for ya...I'll take the heat if Pop or Brock say anything. Try not to get it taken away again,kay? Heh. I know you think it's mushy and gay but, <s>I love ya, brother. Even though we fight alot...I really don't know what I'd do without ya</s>....you're awesome, Hankinator. Go Team Venture!

In other news, what have I been up to? Nothing, really. Just...reading the first aide and GOCI books and playing with Nibbles. He's alot of fun, little zombie spider...he's growing really fast too! Oh and...Kim's trying to teach me how to be more...bossy and take charge with the henchmen. I mean, they aren't taking me really serious when I ask them to "please do this, if you want...if you don't mind"....so, she's trying to teach me how to...be...well, I guess I need to learn how to be mean sometimes. It's kinda hard though, I don't like yelling at people if I can help it.

Triana's very sick....very...very sick. I really hope she'll be okay. I hope she knows...I'll come visit her if she's lonely or needs any help. I've been told I make a mean chicken soup...just...say something and...yeah.

Well, that's about all I've been up to lately. So...see ya around.

~Dea..er...Dr. Arachnid~

So yeah, got my naked lady statue in my lair in my OWN ROOM now! A room that I don't have to share with anyone! Er, no offense, Hank. Sometimes though...you know how it is. With...privacy and all. *ahem*

Hi everyone! Guess where I am? I'm in my lair! I..live here now! And I'm helping K...Spideress run the place! When I woke up she was all snuggling up to me smiling...I forgot I had climbed in bed with her last night. That was kinda...awkward for a moment but...I got used to it and it was kinda nice.

<lj-cut text="Thanks for coming to my party everyone!">
My party was...well, it was okay. It was kinda...bad, but the gifts defiantely made up for it so that's cool.
I'm actually eating the guitar freezy pop Mister Skwisgaar got me and wearing the suit Mister Manager got me right now...so thank you for that, I look pretty snazzy in it actually. Though I was just making sure it fits...I'm only gonna wear it on special occasions though. That Spiderman comic...how old is that? I bet it's worth SO MUCH! And, it's a pretty good one too! So, thanks Mister White! Just finished off the champagne Mister Pickles, thank you!

Between Mister White's comic book, Brock's first aide book (which will DEFINATLEY come in handy, thanks Brock!) and the Guild book m..m...mom gave me, I'll definately have lots of new reading material to keep me busy, so thanks one and all for that! I love reading...

Got some cool stuff for my new super villian gig too! Miss Molotov gave me a cool little mechanical spider that you can put smoke bombs in and send ahead of you into a room, that's neat! Thanks! And Monarch gave me the BEST glove weapon I've EVER seen! Fits me perfectly and you can put poison in it and..wow, it's just great! Thanks so much Mister Monarch! Oh! And Dr. O got me the cutest little zombie spider! ZOMBIE SPIDER! And he's gonna grow up to a BIG zombie spider! I decided to name him Nibbles...since he accidently bit me when I fed him his first mouse this morning after Kim and I went out to pick some up for him. Oh, I meant to ask...he's not..I mean, that's not gonna have any effect on me, right? He did break the skin a little, but I know he didn't mean to, he was just hungry. I feel fine and everything...I just thought I should make sure though.

Pop got me and Hank mini walking eyes and gift cards for Amazon.com...one of the walking eyes blew up though...Hank and I can share the other one I guess, but I left it at home for him. I'll just play with it whenever I visit. I figured out why the guitar Mister Murderface got me didn't sound right...it needed an AMP! So I used Pop's gift card to order one off Amazon.com! It should be here tomorrow prolly...Thanks Pop and Mister Murderface! I'm gonna be a rock star! I'm already trying to write a theme song for Kim and I!

I have some weird black box sitting next to me here from Mister Pierre...but I'm afraid to open it. I don't know what might be inside it and for some reason it's scaring me. Um...oh, Triana got me a HUNDRED DOLLAR gift card for the mall! ...pretty cool of her, huh? And I just LOVE the pjs and plushie Kim bought me...they make me feel all cuddly...yay!
</lj-cut>
The BEST present of all though...was TOTALLY the SOLID GOLD NAKED LADY STATUES Mister Lupin and Mister Jigen dropped off for Hank and I...through our ceiling...but seriously, those things...I couldn't stop staring....I mean, wow. *blush* That was the ONE present I couldn't take with me when I packed my stuff up to move in the lair, and...but I'm TOTALLY coming back for it!! I'll make all the henchmen go grab it and move it into my room here in the lair tomorrow. THANK YOU MISTER LUPIN AND MISTER JIGEN!!!

Oh, Mom also got me some web shooting gloves like Spiderman...and Hank a Batarang. I was trying to figure out how to make my gloves work and ended up accidently spraying Hank in the face right when he threw his Batarang and it came back and hit me in the eye. So I have a nice big purple and blue eye now...though it looks kinda cool now that the swelling's down. I look almost...kinda....tough heh. Cool. Oh, Mom also kidnapped us...that was scary beyond all belief. But Brock got us back...and Mom had Hank's watch (I wonder if he ever got it back...) and she called me later before I went to bed and said she was sorry, she didn't mean to freak us out. Just thought I'd let ya know that Hank, I was supposed to tell you...since you were asleep.

Well, it's late, I'm getting tired so I'm gonna go change into my pjs, grab my plushie and feed Nibbles one last time before I grab Brock's first aide book and read a little then hit the sack. I get kinda squirmy watching Nibbles eat those mice but...*shrugs* Guess it's part of nature, eh?
OH HANK! I forgot to give you your Birthday present from me! I'll come give it to ya tomorrow,okay? Didn't think I'd forget to get my own brother something, did ya?

~Dean~
er.....
~Dr. Arachnid~

....stop your squeeking Nibbles, I'm coming!

It's officially my BIRTHDAY! I'm officially 17!!!! So I shall shout an official HUZZAH!!! :D

Oh boy, I can't wait til my party tonight! Venture Compound, 8pm, hope to see everyone there!!! :D And...try not to cause any troubles for Brock...or he won't let Hank and I have any birthday parties ever again.

What's double cool about today...Kim's picking up the FINISHED LAIR before the party and coming in it! ALRIGHT!

Speaking of Kim...I'm so glad she forgave me and understood...I felt rather stupid about that whole freakin' out over the tattoo thing. Needles are...well, lets just say I hate them ALOT. So once again...sorry.

SO me and Hank are 17 now, look out world! We're one year closer to being legal! *snickers* Happy Birthday Hank! GO TEAM VENTURE!

Wait...what are we gonna do at this party anyway? Should it be a themed party? A COSTUME PARTY?! Are we gonna play games?! Quick, do we have any prizes?! What about snacks! Oh what was I THINKING, I am SO not prepared for this!

http://dean-venture.livejournal.com/25900.html

Well, as usual when it comes to girls...I blew it. 

Kim came over cuz we were both bored, we were sitting there just fine...Hank and I bickered a little....but when Kim went to the bathroom we talked and now we're cool, which is good.

Then Kim suddenly decided she wanted a tattoo. Asked if me and Hank wanted one...Hank had to go off like an idiot and ask Pop if we could get one and of COURSE he said no. But...Kim wanted us to come with her anyway and we did.

The place...was freaky. And the tattoo guy like, didn't speak at all. And did you know that getting a tattoo involved getting stabbed over and over by a BIG BUZZING NEEDLE?! AND YOU BLEED?! Oh GEEZ it was HORRIBLE! I thought I was gonna pass out!! And...I kept clinging to Hank. Like...alot. And he kept pushing me away and calling me a homo. I was like...shaking and stuff...I thought he'd understand....<s>he knows I always turn to him for comfort when I get really scared. He always used to just let me cling to him and pat me on the head and say "It's okay Dean-o" but...not this time.</s> It just made everything worse. 

Now I think Kim thinks I'm mad at her or don't like her or something...AND that I'm a homo!

Oh man. I'm sorry Kim. I was just...really freaked out. I...hope you like your new tattoo. Come visit me tomorrow, we'll go to the movies. Just us. No Hank, no Triana...just you and me.

I'm sorry, I hope you understand. I suck at this whole relationship thing, huh?

~Dean~
http://dean-venture.livejournal.com/25682.html

Wow...Kim really did like me...and....SHE WANTED TO KISS ME! AND SHE TOTALLY DID!

Yeah, I'd say my trip to the mall was pretty great. I mean, it was kinda bad at first. I got kinda mad Hank was there...with Triana at that. I mean like...really mad. Kim and Triana wandered off to talk and...I kinda started yelling at him. And, he totally didn't get it. And...I ended up punching him in the mouth. Which ended with me getting covered in ketchup and shoved on the floor. And led to...Hank walking out on us....he said something to me...that I didn't really understand. But..he wouldn't tell me what he meant. He seemed really upset about it though...

Triana and Kim talked some more after I apologized to them and I just kinda sat there at the table with my head down, feeling bad about what I did....I didn't mean to...it wasn't really Hank's fault.

We went after Hank and found him in Triana's car, and Triana made us all get in with him and talk about why we were fighting. And somehow...I have no idea what happened but....KIM TOLD ME SHE LOVED ME. Wow...how cool is that?! Kim had to go cuz she had a meeting for some mission or something but she's coming over later tonight. To....snuggle and stuff...I guess...*ahem* so...yeah.

So, things started out kinda sucky but..ended up being really great! Execpt...Triana says she's going back to Limb. And...I think Hank might still be mad at me, despite how many times I've said sorry. Well...I guess you can't win them all...

~Dean~

Well, Uncle JJ called me. On my communicator watch. While I was in the shower. Our watches are water proof, but I normally take it off anyway while I'm in the shower....and the one time I don't.....

Awkward? Kinda. I mean, I kept yelling I'M IN THE SHOWER! thinkinging it was Pop or Hank or Brock and that they'd hear me and leave me alone, but the call alert just wouldn't stop beeping....and Hank yelled THAT'S NICE NO ONE CARES!

So...I answered, and it was Uncle JJ, and he wanted to talk to me "man to man"....while I'm in the shower? I even asked if I could call him back and he said no it was important! I mean, couldn't he see that....I mean, I wasn't wearing a shirt, my hair had shampoo in it, and there was water coming down all around me! Geez...

Well, I made sure I held my wrist at chest level the whole time. Still...wow.One of the weirdest things I've ever had to do...talk to someone LIVE while in the shower. And really, what he wanted to say wasn't that important that it couldn't wait. He just wanted to say again that I shouldn't be doing this super villian thing and it would get me in trouble and so on...but then started giving me little hints and tricks to putting the lair together and ideas and so on here and there...that made sense, right? Don't do this Dean, but if you're going to, use this brand of engine instead of this one and so on. Um, ok.

I'm taking a small break from putting everything together anyway. I hope Kim doesn't mind. I mean, I got the costumes done, they should be coming in tomorrow actually. And the plans for the lair are like 95% done, I just have one little calculation that's giving me an issue, and then I can send it off to have it built. And the ads are half way done, I just have to add the text and print them out and pass them around. And then I've gotta do the weapons. So everything's either done or half way done. I feel like I've been stressing myself out on this though, working too hard. So, I'm gonna take a break for a few days. Then I'll get back on it.

My birthday's soon! More on that later!

Unlce JJ didn't really get to tell me any tips to building the lair....in fact, he seemd kinda against me doing the super villian thing. He kept telling me it wasn't a good idea and that it was gonna get me into trouble and so on. He said he'd call me or something though to talk more about it later. Pop didn't seem very happy to be there...so we left like....15 minutes after we ate. The short amount of time I was there was a blast though.


Enjoy this hand turkey I made for you all! Hope you all enjoyed your Thanksgiving! ~Dean~
